content: --परं ({%a%}) further on, any longer (with <ab>abl.</ab>); hereafter; निवसिष्यसि मय्येव अत उर्ध्वं <ls>Bg. 12. 8.</ls> ({%b%}) beyond this, further than this; भाग्यायत्तमतःपरं <ls>Ś. 4. 16</ls> more than this; अतःपरं नास्ति ममोत्तरं <ls>V. 2</ls> {%now%} I have nothing more to say; ({%c%}) afterwards.
